Package org.opensourcephysics.display

Class Arrow

java.lang.Object
org.opensourcephysics.display.Arrow
All Implemented Interfaces:
Drawable
public class Arrow extends Object implements Drawable
A Drawable arrow that uses Java 2D drawing.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Wolfgang Christian
